about_the_game:
A massive tower of stone emerged one day in a land wasted by war, plague and famine. You are one of the many drawn to it by legends of fortune and salvation. Will you succumb to it, conquer it, or discover the secrets deep within?

Devil Spire is a hardcore first-person pseudo-3D roguelite action RPG dungeon crawler stylized after retro PC games, developed by a guy and his bros while locked in quarantine. Inspired by classics like King's Field and Heretic.



FEATURING
  • 24 weapon classes, including ranged and throwing ones, with real dual wielding!
  • 48 unique spells, plus 60 equipment enchantments!
  • 10 dungeon types, each with their own properties, enemies and bosses!
  • 4 game modes, including a 100-floor gauntlet and a boss rush arena!
  • Fully customizable, dynamic character portraits including exotic races!
  • Many interactive objects like traps, barrels, crates, cards, shady characters and, of course, chests full of loot!
  • A kick button!

This DEMO features all of the above, except the following:
  • Only 2 of the 10 dungeons are accessible.
  • Only one of the game modes is accessible.
  • The game stops after the first boss is defeated.
  • Saving and Loading is disabled.
  • Unlocking game modes is disabled.
  • Steam features like Cloud Saving and Achievements are also disabled.

Try it out now and get the full version for the complete experience!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains blood, corpses, mild gore and implications of torture and suicide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP and up
  • Processor: Any with at least 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with at least 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with DirectX 9 support

short_description: Roguelite Pseudo-3D Dungeon Crawler. It's King's Field but procedurally generated, and with Hexen-style graphics!
